trans-unit.source: Adds a tab to the Stats dashboard, showing the pages requested by your visitors that have not been found.
trans-unit.target: Adds a tab to the Stats dashboard, showing the pages requested by your visitors that have not been found.

trans-unit.source: The "pages not found" cache has been emptied.
trans-unit.target: The "pages not found" cache has been emptied.

trans-unit.source: The "pages not found" cache has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: The "pages not found" cache has been deleted.

trans-unit.source: A 404 error is an HTTP error code which means that the file requested by the user cannot be found. In your case it means that one of your visitors entered a wrong URL in the address bar, or that you or another website has a dead link. When possible, the referrer is shown so you can find the page/site which contains the dead link. If not, it generally means that it is a direct access, so someone may have bookmarked a link which doesn't exist anymore.
trans-unit.target: A 404 error is an HTTP error code which means that the file requested by the user cannot be found. In your case it means that one of your visitors entered a wrong URL in the address bar, or that you or another website has a dead link. When possible, the referrer is shown so you can find the page/site which contains the dead link. If not, it generally means that it is a direct access, so someone may have bookmarked a link which doesn't exist anymore.

trans-unit.source: If your webhost supports .htaccess files, you can create one in the root directory of PrestaShop and insert the following line inside: "%s".
trans-unit.target: If your webhost supports .htaccess files, you can create one in the root directory of PrestaShop and insert the following line inside: "%s".

trans-unit.source: A user requesting a page which doesn't exist will be redirected to the following page: %s. This module logs access to this page.
trans-unit.target: A user requesting a page which doesn't exist will be redirected to the following page: %s. This module logs access to this page.

trans-unit.source: You must use a .htaccess file to redirect 404 errors to the "404.php" page.
trans-unit.target: You must use a .htaccess file to redirect 404 errors to the "404.php" page.

trans-unit.source: No "page not found" issue registered for now.
trans-unit.target: No "page not found" issue registered for now.

trans-unit.source: Empty ALL "pages not found" notices for this period
trans-unit.target: Empty ALL "pages not found" notices for this period

trans-unit.source: Enrich your stats, display the pages requested by your visitors that could not be found.
trans-unit.target: Enrich your stats, display the pages requested by your visitors that could not be found.
